item.text: At that time Amraphel king of Shinar, Arioch king of Ellasar, Kedorlaomer king of Elam, and Tidal king of nations

<st data-num="06213" class="">went to</st> <st data-num="04421" class="">war</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0854" class="">against</st> <st data-num="01298" class="">Bera</st> <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> of <st data-num="05467" class="">Sodom</st>, <st data-num="01306" class="">Birsha</st> <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> of <st data-num="06017" class="">Gomorrah</st>, <st data-num="08134" class="">Shinab</st> <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> of <st data-num="0126" class="">Admah</st>, <st data-num="08038" class="">Shemeber</st> <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> of <st data-num="06636" class="">Zeboyim</st>, and the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> of <st data-num="01106" class="">Bela</st> (<st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> is, <st data-num="06820" class="">Zoar</st>).<n id="2" />

<st data-num="0428" class="">These</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">last</st> five kings<n id="1" /> <st data-num="02266" class="">joined forces</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="0413" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="06010" class="">Valley</st> of <st data-num="07708" class="">Siddim</st> (<st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> is, the <st data-num="04417" class="">Salt</st> <st data-num="03220" class="">Sea</st>).<n id="3" />

For <st data-num="08147 06240">twelve</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st><n id="1" /> they had <st data-num="05647" class="">served</st> <st data-num="03540" class="">Kedorlaomer</st>, but in the <st data-num="07969 06240">thirteenth</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">year</st><n id="2" /> they <st data-num="04775" class="">rebelled</st>.<n id="3" />

In the <st data-num="0702 06240">fourteenth</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">year</st>, <st data-num="03540" class="">Kedorlaomer</st> and the <st data-num="04428" class="">kings</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> were his <st data-num="0854" class="">allies</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">came</st> and <st data-num="05221" class="">defeated</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="07497" class="">Rephaites</st> in <st data-num="06255" class="">Ashteroth Karnaim</st>, the <st data-num="02104" class="">Zuzites</st> in <st data-num="01990" class="">Ham</st>, the <st data-num="0368" class="">Emites</st> in <st data-num="07741" class="">Shaveh Kiriathaim</st>,

and the <st data-num="02752" class="">Horites</st> in their <st data-num="02022" class="">hill country</st> of <st data-num="08165" class="">Seir</st>, <st data-num="05704" class="">as far as</st> <st data-num="0364" class="">El Paran</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">which</st> is <st data-num="05921" class="">near</st> the <st data-num="04057" class="">desert</st>.<n id="1" />
Then they attacked En Mishpat (that is, Kadesh) again, and they conquered all the territory of the Amalekites, as well as the Amorites who were living in Hazezon Tamar.
Then the king of Sodom, the king of Gomorrah, the king of Admah, the king of Zeboyim, and the king of Bela (that is, Zoar) went out and prepared for battle. In the Valley of Siddim they met

<st data-num="03540" class="">Kedorlaomer</st> <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> of <st data-num="05867" class="">Elam</st>, <st data-num="08413" class="">Tidal</st> <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> of <st data-num="01471" class="">nations</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0569" class="">Amraphel</st> <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> of <st data-num="08152" class="">Shinar</st>, and <st data-num="0746" class="">Arioch</st> <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> of <st data-num="0495" class="">Ellasar</st>. <st data-num="0702" class="">Four</st> <st data-num="04428" class="">kings</st> fought <st data-num="0854" class="">against</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="02568" class="">five</st>.

Now the <st data-num="06010" class="">Valley</st> of <st data-num="07708" class="">Siddim</st> was <st data-num="0875" class="">full of</st> <st data-num="02564" class="">tar</st> <st data-num="0875" class="">pits</st>.<n id="1" /> When the <st data-num="04428" class="">kings</st> of <st data-num="05467" class="">Sodom</st> and <st data-num="06017" class="">Gomorrah</st> <st data-num="05127" class="">fled</st>, they <st data-num="05307" class="">fell</st> <st data-num="08033" class="">into them</st>,<n id="2" /> but some <st data-num="07604" class="">survivors</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="05127" class="">fled</st> to the <st data-num="02022" class="">hills</st>.<n id="4" />

The four victorious kings<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03947" class="">took</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="07399" class="">possessions</st> and <st data-num="03605 0400">food</st> of <st data-num="05467" class="">Sodom</st> and <st data-num="06017" class="">Gomorrah</st> and <st data-num="01980" class="">left</st>.
They also took Abram’s nephew Lot and his possessions when they left, for Lot was living in Sodom.
A fugitive came and told Abram the Hebrew. Now Abram was living by the oaks of Mamre the Amorite, the brother of Eshcol and Aner. (All these were allied by treaty with Abram.)

When <st data-num="087" class="">Abram</st> <st data-num="08085" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> his <st data-num="0251" class="">nephew</st><n id="1" /> had been <st data-num="07617" class="">taken captive</st>, he <st data-num="07324" class="">mobilized</st><n id="2" /> his <st data-num="08083 06240 07969 03967">318</st> <st data-num="02593" class="">trained men</st> who had been <st data-num="03211" class="">born</st> in his <st data-num="01004" class="">household</st>, and he <st data-num="07291" class="">pursued</st> the invaders<n id="3" /> <st data-num="05704" class="">as far as</st> <st data-num="01835" class="">Dan</st>.<n id="4" />

Then, during the <st data-num="03915" class="">night</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="01931" class="">Abram</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="02505" class="">divided</st> his <st data-num="05650" class="">forces</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">against</st> them and <st data-num="05221" class="">defeated</st> them. He <st data-num="07291" class="">chased</st> them <st data-num="05704" class="">as far as</st> <st data-num="02327" class="">Hobah</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">which</st> is <st data-num="08040" class="">north</st><n id="4" /> of <st data-num="01834" class="">Damascus</st>.
He retrieved all the stolen property. He also brought back his nephew Lot and his possessions, as well as the women and the rest of the people.
After Abram returned from defeating Kedorlaomer and the kings who were with him, the king of Sodom went out to meet Abram in the Valley of Shaveh (known as the King’s Valley).

<st data-num="04442" class="">Melchizedek</st> <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> of <st data-num="08004" class="">Salem</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03318" class="">brought out</st> <st data-num="03899" class="">bread</st> and <st data-num="03196" class="">wine</st>. (Now <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> was the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> of the <st data-num="05945" class="">Most High</st> <st data-num="0410" class="">God</st>.)<n id="2" />

He blessed Abram, saying,

“Blessed be Abram by the Most High God,

Creator of heaven and earth.

Worthy of praise is the Most High God,

who delivered your enemies into your hand.”

Abram gave Melchizedek a tenth of everything.
Then the king of Sodom said to Abram, “Give me the people and take the possessions for yourself.”
But Abram replied to the king of Sodom, “I raise my hand to the Lord, the Most High God, Creator of heaven and earth, and vow

that I will <st data-num="03947" class="">take</st> <st data-num="0518 03605">nothing</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0834" class="">belonging</st> to you, <st data-num="0518" class="">not even</st> a <st data-num="02339" class="">thread</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">or</st> the <st data-num="08288" class="">strap</st> of a <st data-num="05275" class="">sandal</st>. That way you can <st data-num="03808" class="">never</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st>, ‘It is <st data-num="0589" class="">I</st><n id="2" /> who <st data-num="06238" class="">made</st> <st data-num="087" class="">Abram</st> <st data-num="06238" class="">rich</st>.’
I will take nothing except compensation for what the young men have eaten. As for the share of the men who went with me—Aner, Eshcol, and Mamre—let them take their share.”
